data.name: The Last Tree
data.detailed_description:
This puzzle-platformer offers right-to-left exploration of six biomes (Tundra, Grassland, Desert, Aquatic, Cave and Forest) while rescuing Ungrodo. It will surely test your jumping/avoiding projectiles in slow motion skills.

  • Superhot and Braid inspired mechanics
  • Soundtrack is completely relaxing classical music
  • In contrary to every 2D platformer ever, this platformer is going in the left direction

Through this game I’m trying also to raise awareness about deforestation and clearing Earth's forests on a massive scale worldwide, which happens for many reasons, but most of them are related to money.
data.about_the_game:
This puzzle-platformer offers right-to-left exploration of six biomes (Tundra, Grassland, Desert, Aquatic, Cave and Forest) while rescuing Ungrodo. It will surely test your jumping/avoiding projectiles in slow motion skills.

  • Superhot and Braid inspired mechanics
  • Soundtrack is completely relaxing classical music
  • In contrary to every 2D platformer ever, this platformer is going in the left direction

Through this game I’m trying also to raise awareness about deforestation and clearing Earth's forests on a massive scale worldwide, which happens for many reasons, but most of them are related to money.
data.short_description: The year is 2092, and the tree called Ungrodo is the last tree on Earth and everybody’s chasing him. But he has superpower - TIME SLOWS DOWN WHEN HE MOVES. Also, Ungrodo is pretty good at puzzles. Would you save him?
data.reviews:
“So, the gameplay of this game is really simple. Go from right to… left? Yes, a reverse 2D-platform. Neat.”
NekoJonez's Gaming Blog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
